requirements_en.minimum:

  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU

  • Storage: 150 MB available space

PC Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10870H CPU @ 2.20GHz, 2208 Mhz, 8 Core(s), 16 Logical Processor(s) Unless you've got super fast Air Link your headset needs to be connected to your PC via a link cable.
